name: Casino Panic
description:
OH NO! 
The Mafia Dice wants to take over your family casino!
Shoot poker chips and spin yourself to beat 'em up! You are a slot machine after all...

- Download the executable for better performance! :D

  WASD/ARROWS to move
 SPACE to spin

~ Made for the GMTK2022 Game Jam
Code: Samuele "FrittoMisto" Miraglia
Art: Albina "Carota" Pastore
